lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The failure of the International Coffee Organisation to agree on the reintroduction of export quotas would mean "several African countries will not have the foreign exchange to import essential items," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Growing protectionism and declining commodity prices had caused a major deterioration in the export earnings of all developing countries, he said in an opening speech to a meeting of African trade ministers in Addis Ababa.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: N. Program for Africa's economic recovery and development, despite Africa's willingness to raise two thirds of the capital from domestic sources.
